divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my bedroom watching television when my mom thought she heard a gunshot, so I went out the back door to investigate. I didn't hear anything, but a flashing light in the sky caught my glimpse. At first I thought it was a plane because it was flashing and the light appeared to change colors. It was approximately the same size as a big star, but it flashed red, blue, and white. It pulsated and changed color. It did not change position, it just pulsated. I ran inside to grab my glasses, as I thought I was imagining this or just not seeing well. It was still there and I continued to watch for approximately ten minutes. I went back in the house because I got cold, but it was still just hanging there flashing. It appeared from my vantage point to be south east of town.
Summary: blinking light that stayed stationary in the sky
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
